aviator.name: Mobile App Development
aviator.content: The development of Aviator's Oasis focused on creating a seamless user experience, blending functionality with a visually appealing interface. Users can effortlessly navigate through various features, including forums for discussing flight experiences, photo sharing galleries, and real-time flight tracking.
aviator.backendDevelopment: Backend Development with Node.js and Express

ecommerce.name: E-commerce SEO
ecommerce.content:
**SEO Strategy Development**

We conducted a comprehensive SEO audit to identify key improvement areas and developed a customized strategy specifically tailored for this eCommerce project.

**On-Page SEO**

We enhanced product content, meta tags, headers, and images to boost keyword relevance and improve user experience, with a focus on floral keywords and seasonal trends.

**Technical SEO**

We resolved technical issues by integrating the website with Google Search Console, optimizing the sitemap, and refining the robots.txt file to enhance site performance and indexability.

**Off-Page SEO**

We executed a targeted link-building campaign and leveraged social media platforms to increase domain authority and boost online presence, targeting local influencers and specialized floral blogs.

**Conclusion**

Through a holistic approach covering strategy development, on-page optimizations, technical enhancements, and off-page initiatives, we achieved a remarkable improvement in organic search traffic, demonstrating the effectiveness of a comprehensive SEO campaign.

feedback1.name: Lydia DUAN - Project Manager
feedback1.feedback: Thomas wrote several SEO blog articles in Spanish for our client specialized in Travel & Tourism. The articles are of high quality, and his adaptable writing style truly shines. Thank you so much for your outstanding work, Thomas!

feedback2.name: Olivier LENOIR - Executive
feedback2.feedback: We’ve been working with Thomas almost daily for over a year now. He is always deeply involved and dedicated to delivering the best results, constantly bringing fresh ideas to the table. Always available and a pleasure to work with, I highly recommend him!

feedback3.name: Claire MAINAUD - Personal Development Coach
feedback3.feedback: I reached out to Thomas for my website and communication strategy. He is incredibly pleasant, always available, proactive, and a great listener. I wholeheartedly recommend contacting him for your professional projects—I'm confident he will exceed your expectations! I never hesitate to speak highly of him to everyone in my network!

feedback4.name: Léo NISHIBAYASHI - Educational Coordinator
feedback4.feedback: Thomas Pialles was an excellent trainer at our school, Rocket School! We engaged him for a one-week training session in copywriting and content marketing for a group of Growth Hackers. Our students really appreciated his session! Thomas is professional and has outstanding teaching skills—he perfectly adapts to the needs of both the institution and the learners. We’re already planning to invite him back for sessions on BizDev, CSM, and Growth, and we can’t wait for his return!

quote.question: How can I request a quote for a project?
quote.answer: You can request a quote by filling out our online form or contacting our sales team directly. We'll get back to you within 24 hours with a detailed proposal based on your project requirements.

industries.question: What industries do you serve?
industries.answer: We serve a wide range of industries including technology, healthcare, finance, retail, education, and manufacturing. Our solutions are customized to meet the specific needs of each sector.

timeline.question: What is the typical timeline for a project?
timeline.answer: Project timelines vary depending on scope and complexity. Typically, small projects take 2-4 weeks, medium projects 1-3 months, and large projects 3-6 months. We'll provide a detailed timeline during the initial consultation.
